entry.title: Crypto Fraud Dismantled: Hong Kong Cops Bust $1.4 Million Syndicate
entry.summary:
Four people have been arrested by Hong Kong police; among them is a shocking discovery of a 14-year-old lad reportedly defrauding gullible victims with fake cash. With total losses of HK$11 million (US$1.4 million), this arrest represents a major turning point in an ongoing enquiry that has seen 14 individuals arrested since October last year, the South China Morning Post has reported.
Chief Inspector Lo Yuen-shan of the Commercial Crime Bureau announced on Sunday that the seven suspects, aged between 14 and 39, were charged with conspiracy to defraud, possession and use of 5,000 counterfeit banknotes. Lo underlined the syndicate‚Äôs well-organized structure and how clearly duties were allocated among the members to carry out their frauds.
Setting Up The Trap
The con artists set up b‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner from Wall Street Plans to Double Revenue with New Hydroelectric Data Center
entry.summary: HIVE Digital Technologies Ltd., the Bitcoin miner from Wall Street (Nasdaq: HIVE) announced plans to construct a 100-megawatt BTC mining operation in Paraguay, aiming to double its revenue and significantly boost its hashrate capacity. Wall Street Bitcoin Miner Plans 100MW Bitcoin Mine in Paraguay, Targets Revenue Boost The Vancouver-based company, which specializes in green-focused data centers, intends to power the facility using clean energy from the Itaipu hydroelectric dam. This expansion is expected to increase HIVE's global Bitcoin mining capacity from 5.6 to 12.1 exahash per second (EH/s) within the next year. "This represents a significant milestone in our diversified growth strategy," Frank Holmes, HIVE's Executive Chairman, commented. "We are confident that t‚Ä¶

entry.title: WazirX Didn't Insure Customers‚Äô Funds: Plans to Lock 45% Assets of ‚ÄòAll Users‚Äô
entry.summary: WazirX, the Indian cryptocurrency exchange that suffered a loss of $230 million in a cyberattack, has devised a controversial recovery plan that would impact all the platform's users, even those who were not affected by the attack. The platform did not insure clients‚Äô funds. According to a blog post published by the exchange on Saturday, the ‚Äúsocialisation‚Äù of the losses and the distribution of the impact among all users have been proposed. However, the exchange will conduct a vote on the controversial proposal by August 3. Users Suffer Due to the Lack of Insurance Crypto exchange hacks are not new. entry.summary: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‚Äòunban BTC‚Äô in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.

entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he‚Äôs still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn‚Äôt done with the project. Instead, he‚Äôs planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 156 - ETH ON THE RISE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$147m. ETH outperforms with ETF optimism. Germany government moves 2375 BTC again. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...

ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‚Äòpower law‚Äô points to 300% gain by 2025. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‚Äòcomparable to FTX‚Äô. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!

Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023.
